Revoke.definition: to annul by recalling or taking back

re·vok·ing.definition: to annul by recalling or taking back

sub_terms.a: to destroy the effectiveness of (a will) by executing another or by an act of destruction (as tearing or crossing out)
sub_terms.b: to put an end to (a trust)
sub_terms.c: to withdraw (an offer) esp. before acceptance
sub_terms.d: to withdraw (acceptance of goods) by refusing to keep goods because of nonconformity see also
sub_terms.e: to take back (as a license or a grant of parole or probation) esp. because of misconduct
